column2: As a Fleet Operations Manager at Alt Mobility, you will play a crucial role in implementing and maintaining fleet operations to drive operational efficiency, Fleet health & Utilisation and informed decision-making across the organisation. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration and utilisation of technology-driven solutions.            ?    Responsibilities:         Collaborate with different OEM s for service data & analyse different parameters like TAT , cost , job type etc.   Handling the Road Side Assistance (RSA) support system for accident & breakdown vehicles.   Handling end to end operations for new vehicles procurement i.e placing order to delivery   Handling Insurance Claim Management & liaising with Insurance companies.   Asset utilisation check along with all related parameters around it.   Handling insurance claims process for fleet vehicles.   Physical health check of the vehicles & come up with the findings of repairs required.   Analysis of the life cycle data of the vehicles & the repairs of the vehicle as per the services done & the requirements.   Taking care of refurbishments/repairs of the vehicles for re-deploying in the market          Qualifications:         Bachelors degree in Mechanical, Automobile or related field.   3 - 5 years of experience in managing fleet operations.   Strong knowledge on the automobiles especially electric vehicles & support systems would be preferred   Experience in implementing and managing practical issues in the fleet operations   Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to analyse complex issues and develop effective solutions.   Attention to detail and commitment to fleet management   Ability to adapt to a fast-paced startup environment and navigate ambiguity.

column1: Sales and Marketing Officer (Cold Chain Road Transportation)
column2: As a Sales and Marketing Executive, you will play a pivotal role in driving business growth by promoting our cold chain transportation and Warehousing services. Your in-depth knowledge of cold chain logistics, combined with your strategic mindset, will be instrumental in expanding our client base and ensuring customer satisfaction.Role & responsibilities Business Development: Identify and target potential clients within the FMCG sector who require cold chain transportation services. And Develop and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers in client organizations. Create customized transportation solutions tailored to each clients unique requirements. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless execution of transportation contracts. Sales and Marketing: Conduct market research to identify trends, competitive landscape, and growth opportunities.  Prepare compelling sales presentations and proposals. Develop and execute effective sales strategies to achieve revenue targets. Client Relationship Management: As a trusted advisor to clients, providing insights into cold chain logistics best practices. Address client inquiries, resolve issues, and ensure exceptional service delivery. Monitor client satisfaction and proactively address any concerns. Represent the company at industry events, trade shows, and conferences. Preferred candidate profile: Proven track record of achieving sales targets and building long-term client relationships. To achieve the target. In-depth understanding of cold chain logistics, including temperature-controlled storage, distribution, and compliance. Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.Education: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Sales & Marketing, or a Supply ChainExperience: 8 to 10 years (sales and marketing, specifically within the cold chain transportation industry.)Preferred only  Male CandidatesKey Skills: Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a dynamic environment.Strong understanding of cold chain logistics principles, temperature-controlled transportation, and industry-specific regulations and compliance standards.Excellent communication and negotiation skills, with the ability to build rapport and establish trust with clients at all levels.Self-motivated and results-oriented, with a proactive approach to problem-solving and decision-making.Proficiency in MS Office applications and CRM software for sales tracking and reporting.Employment Type: Full Time, Permanent
